output: html_document

## Import Data
```{r}
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
ipm_2018 <- read_xlsx(
  path = "Komponen IPM 2018-2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "2018"
)

ipm_2019 <- read_xlsx(
  path = "Komponen IPM 2018-2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "2019"
)

ipm_2020 <- read_xlsx(
  path = "Komponen IPM 2018-2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "2020"
)

ipm_2021 <- read_xlsx(
  path = "Komponen IPM 2018-2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "2021"
)

ipm_2022 <- read_xlsx(
  path = "Komponen IPM 2018-2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "2022"
)

head(ipm_2019)
```

## Visualisasi Data
### 2018
```{r}
boxplot(ipm_2018$UHH, main = "UHH")
boxplot(ipm_2018$HLS, main = "HLS")
boxplot(ipm_2018$RLS, main = "RLS")
boxplot(ipm_2018$Pengeluaran_Riil_Kap , main = "Pengeluaran_Riil_Kap")
```

## Korelasi
### 2018
```{r}
corrplot(
 cor(ipm_2018[,-1]),
 method = 'square', 
 type = 'lower', 
 diag = FALSE)
```

## PCA
### 2018
```{r}
pca_2018 <- prcomp(ipm_2018[,-1], scale. = T)
summary(pca_2018)
```

```{r}
fviz_pca_biplot(pca_2018,
                geom = c("point","text")
                )
```
